topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5441c7ca6368721181d20000#post_5441c7ca6368721181d20000
[spoiler]The Quincies aren't dead. They have a king named Juhabach. Ichigo's mom was a quincy. Ichigo went through yet another form change. The Quincies invaded Soul Society and killed Yamamoto. They retreated and then invaded again and are now currently trying to kill the Soul King. And all the quincies have really silly names.[/spoiler]
